channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Springfield pastors speak out on Haitian refugee challenges: 'The suffering is real'

item.title: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul undergoing treatment for skin cancer
item.description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul on Friday received treatment for skin cancer, specifically basal cell carcinoma.

item.title: The Real Scandal in Springfield, Ohio
item.description: The cats and dogs may be safe and sound, but all is not right in Springfield.

item.title: Garland Says DOJ Is Not A ‘Political Weapon’ While Waging Lawfare Against Trump For Opposing Democrats
item.description: Garland’s Justice Department has been caught up in multiple weaponization scandals.

item.title: Lawmakers crack down on CCP influence in US government tech, warn of potentially 'devastating' cyber attack
item.description: House and Senate lawmakers are moving to safeguard the U.S. government from the effects of the growing technology "gray market."

item.title: Trump’s Terrible Tariffs
item.description: Perhaps the strongest indictment of his trade policies is that Joe Biden looked at them and thought they were worth continuing.

item.title: Newsom Will Oppose Giving Home Down Payments To Illegals Only As Long As Kamala Needs Votes
item.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom’s true strategy is not to become moderate but to appear moderate — at least until the election.

item.title: Obamacare Is Still Wrecking Our Health-Care System

item.title: Fani Willis likely to defy Georgia state Senate subpoena ahead of hearing Friday, chairman says
item.description: District Attorney Fani Willis is expected to defy a Georgia state senate subpoena for her testimony ahead of a hearing Friday, Fox News has learned.

item.title: ACLU pours millions into state Supreme Court races in Montana, Michigan over abortion
item.description: The American Civil Liberties Union is pouring millions of dollars into state Supreme Court elections in Michigan and Montana.

item.title: House GOP rolling out bill to block China from accessing US ports
item.description: FIRST ON FOX: GOP Rep. Michelle Steele is rolling out a bill to block China and other American adversaries from accessing U.S. ports.

item.title: A Literary Giant Confronts His Would-Be Assassin
item.description: Salman Rushdie's latest book, 'Knife: Meditations After an Attempted Murder,' is compelling meditation on mortality and free speech.
